message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI. 

The paper proposes a new approach to topic modeling that is specifically designed for computer vision applications involving "visual words". Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). However, the paper also discusses the use of entropy-based metrics and the importance of vocabulary selection, which are common topics in machine learning and natural language processing. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.CL (Computation and Language), and cs.IR (Information Retrieval) are also likely sub-categories. Finally, since the proposed approach involves learning a latent model, cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is also a possible sub-category.
